short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Immersive Interpretation Delivery to any browser-based meeting, event or live stream to empower multilingual communication by GT.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Receiver for simultaneous interpretation at just 1 click, designed and developed by Green Terp Technologies.

Seamless interpretation delivery to any browser-based meetings, hybrid or virtual events, and live streaming meetings.

GT Mobile extension, developed by Green Terp Technologies, delivers simultaneous interpretation (provided by human interpreters) to online meetings (Google Meet, Microsoft Teams, Bluejeans, etc.), events (Canapii, Gevme, etc.) and live streaming platforms in a seamless manner. 

Add the GT Mobile extension, and your event is SI ready! 

Participants get to listen to interpretation in different languages in the same tab as the meeting/event/stream, with automatic or manual control over original and interpretation volumes. 

Secure end-to-end encryption of audio delivery, with optimal sound quality. 

The quickest and the easiest SI solution to hybrid or virtual events and conferences. 

How to use:
1. Click on the extension and paste the GT Mobile URL, then Click 'Start'.
2. Select the language in the (LAN) dropdown list
3. Adjust the Floor (FLR) or Interpretation (INT) volume
